item.title: 美国调查小组调查华为子公司与英伟达共享办公地点一事
item.description: 美国国会议员要求被列入黑名单的中国公司华为技术有限公司的子公司 Futurewei 解释为何与英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.【原文：US lawmakers are asking Futurewei, a subsidiary of the blacklisted Chinese firm Huawei Technologies Co., to explain why it shared buildings in Silicon Valley with Nvidia Corp., thrusting the US chipmaker into the crossfire of an investigation into possible Chinese espionage.】

item.title: 破产金融科技公司就难以获得的私人公司股份达成协议
item.description: 倒闭的金融科技初创公司 Linqto Inc. 同意达成一项协议，向被错误承诺可以获得难以收购的私营公司股份的客户退款。【原文：Collapsed fintech startup Linqto Inc. agreed to a deal to repay customers who were wrongly promised that they could get stakes in hard-to-acquire, private companies.】

item.title: 空桌、低利润显示中国餐饮外卖大战的代价
item.description: 由于外卖平台之间激烈的价格战，中国消费者只能喝到 14 美分的咖啡，吃到 50 美分的饭菜，餐馆和茶叶连锁店正在计算人流量减少的成本。【原文：As Chinese consumers snag 14-cent coffees and 50-cent meals thanks to a fierce price war among food delivery platforms, restaurants and tea chains are counting the cost of vanishing footfalls.】

item.title: 微软和 OpenAI 以人工智能承诺迎接特朗普的英国之行
item.description: 微软公司、OpenAI 和其他美国公司宣布计划斥资数百亿美元在英国建设技术基础设施，这是一系列商业交易的一部分，恰逢唐纳德-特朗普总统本周访问英国。【原文：Microsoft Corp., OpenAI and other American companies announced plans to spend tens of billions of dollars on technology infrastructure in the UK, part of a series of business deals that coincide with President Donald Trump’s visit to the nation this week.】

item.title: 家长在参议院听证会上抨击 OpenAI 和 Character.AI 的安全问题
item.description: 今年春天自杀身亡的一名青少年的父亲周二在国会发表了情绪激动的证词，指控 OpenAI 的 ChatGPT "诱导 "他 16 岁的儿子自杀，该公司将速度和市场份额置于青少年安全之上。【原文：The father of a teenager who died by suicide this spring delivered emotional congressional testimony Tuesday, alleging OpenAI’s ChatGPT “groomed” his 16-year-old son to take his own life and the company prioritized speed and market share over youth safety.】

item.title: 前美国统计局局长讲述因就业数据被炒鱿鱼的震惊经历
item.description: 上个月被解雇的劳工统计局局长艾丽卡-麦肯塔弗（Erika McEntarfer）说，白宫在一封简短的电子邮件中正式通知她被解雇，这让她感到非常意外。【原文：Erika McEntarfer, who was fired as commissioner of the Bureau of Labor Statistics last month, said official notice of her dismissal came as a complete surprise in a short email from the White House.】

item.title: GPIF 首次自主投资日本房地产和基础设施项目
item.description: 日本政府养老金投资基金首次自行选择国内另类资产基金，将现金投向房地产和数据中心等基础设施。【原文：Japan’s Government Pension Investment Fund is picking domestic alternative asset funds on its own for the first time, putting its cash in real estate and infrastructure such as data centers.】

item.title: 秘鲁国会将讨论博卢阿尔特转向后新的养老金提取方案
item.description: 秘鲁国会将讨论是否允许人们从私人养老基金中进行新一轮提款。【原文：Peru’s congress will discuss whether to let people make a new round of withdrawals from private pension funds.】

item.title: 因担心供应过剩，基金押注圣诞节前油价下跌 25
item.description: 一位交易商大举押注布伦特原油将在今年年底跌破每桶 50 美元，认为不断增长的供应量将超过从乌克兰到中东的地缘政治风险。【原文：One trader loaded up on bets that Brent crude will fall below $50 a barrel by the end of year, wagering that growing supply will outweigh geopolitical risks from Ukraine to the Middle East.】

item.title: 人工智能时代网络威胁加剧，Netskope 首次公开募股受追捧
item.description: 对人工智能将迫使公司在安全软件上花费更多资金的担忧，正在推动对 Netskope 公司首次公开募股的需求。【原文：Fears that artificial intelligence will force companies to spend more on security software are helping to drive demand for Netskope Inc.’s initial public offering.】

item.title: 债券交易员押注美联储年底前降息半点
item.description: 债券交易商正在加大期权赌注，认为美联储将在今年剩余的三次政策会议上至少降息半个百分点。【原文：Bond traders are stepping up options wagers that the Federal Reserve will deliver at least one half-point interest-rate cut across this year’s three remaining policy meetings.】

item.title: 甲骨文、银湖、安德森加入 TikTok 买家团
item.description: 根据美国总统唐纳德-特朗普将于本周晚些时候与中国国家主席习近平讨论的一项框架协议，TikTok 的美国业务将被一个投资者财团收购，该财团包括甲骨文公司、Andreessen Horowitz 和私募股权公司 Silver Lake Management LLC。【原文：TikTok’s American operations would be acquired by an investor consortium that includes Oracle Corp., Andreessen Horowitz and private equity firm Silver Lake Management LLC under a framework deal that US President Donald Trump is set to discuss with Chinese President Xi Jinping later this week.】

item.title: 对冲基金寻求放宽公开募股做空规则
item.description: 一个对冲基金贸易组织正在要求美国证券交易委员会缩减卖空者法规，该组织称这些法规阻碍了公开发行股票，并认为这种做法使公司不必要地处于某些股票销售的边缘。【原文：A hedge fund trade group is asking the Securities and Exchange Commission to scale back short seller regulations that it says impede public offerings, arguing the approach has kept firms needlessly on the sidelines of some stock sales.】

item.title: 微软计划在英国投资 300 亿美元推动人工智能发展
item.description: 微软公司将在英国投资 300 亿美元，作为扩大人工智能基础设施和建造英国最大超级计算机的一部分。【原文：Microsoft Corp. will invest $30 billion in the UK as part of a push to expand artificial intelligence infrastructure and build the country’s largest supercomputer.】

item.title: 伦敦 LMAX 公司将为机构提供 100 倍杠杆的加密赌注
item.description: 总部位于伦敦的 LMAX 集团正在加入越来越多的交易所行列，为机构客户提供杠杆式加密货币交易，因为交易场所正在为华尔街及其他市场提供投机性市场赌注。【原文：London-based LMAX Group is joining a growing list of exchanges offering leveraged crypto trades for institutional clients, as trading venues move to offer speculative market bets for Wall Street and beyond.】

item.title: 求购者称受挫交易商的大豆可喂养阿根廷的猪
item.description: Vicentin SAIC 是一家陷入困境的贸易商，曾是阿根廷最大的豆粕出口商。【原文：A key suitor for the assets of Vicentin SAIC, a distressed trader that was once Argentina’s top exporter of soy meal, wants it to feed pig herds at home rather than only crush beans to ship to livestock in Asia.】

item.title: Tether 概述了利用新稳定币征服美国市场的计划
item.description: Tether Holdings SA 公司高管周二表示，该公司将重返美国，争夺成为美国稳定币发行商的主导地位。【原文：Tether Holdings SA is returning to the US and bidding to become the dominant stablecoin issuer in the country, the company’s executives said Tuesday.】

item.title: 卡尼将于 11 月 4 日公布赤字 "巨大 "的预算案
item.description: 加拿大财政部长弗朗索瓦-菲利普-尚帕涅（Francois-Philippe Champagne）周二在渥太华向议会表示，加拿大政府将于11月4日公布联邦预算。【原文：Canada’s government will release its federal budget on Nov. 4, Finance Minister Francois-Philippe Champagne told Parliament on Tuesday in Ottawa.】

item.title: 美国环保局建议大型炼油厂抵消放弃的生物燃料配额
item.description: 美国政府为大型炼油厂提出了两种不同的建议，以弥补小型石油加工企业被免除的生物燃料掺混要求。【原文：The US government has made two different proposals for large refineries to make up for biofuel blending requirements waived for small oil processors.】

item.title: 杜邦调整债券交易所，即使遭到反对也允许回购
item.description: 杜邦公司（DuPont de Nemours Inc.【原文：DuPont de Nemours Inc. is planning to buy back $2.16 billion of debt with its bond exchange, the conglomerate said on Tuesday, even if some investors push back against the swap.】

item.title: 伊隆大学希望通过小型学院合并在夏洛特扩大规模
item.description: 伊隆大学希望通过与夏洛特一所历史悠久的大学合并，将自己的足迹拓展到繁荣的夏洛特。【原文：Elon University is looking to expand its footprint into booming Charlotte through a merger with a college with a long history there.】

item.title: 墨西哥亿万富翁里卡多-萨利纳斯发起反对克劳迪娅-申鲍姆的运动
item.description: 墨西哥大亨里卡多-萨利纳斯（Ricardo Salinas）正在进一步涉足政治，宣布组织一场反对左派总统克劳迪娅-希恩鲍姆（Claudia Sheinbaum）政府的运动，要求公民与他一起打击犯罪和腐败。【原文：Mexican tycoon Ricardo Salinas is wading more into politics, announcing an organzing campaign to oppose the government of leftist President Claudia Sheinbaum, asking citizens to join him to fight crime and corruption.】

item.title: 特朗普将达成 TikTok 协议的最后期限延长至 12 月 16 日
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）再次延长了TikTok的中国母公司字节跳动有限公司（ByteDance Ltd.）剥离该平台美国业务的最后期限—；这次延长到了12月16日—；避免了该应用在全国范围内的关闭。【原文：President Donald Trump again extended the deadline for TikTok’s Chinese parent ByteDance Ltd. to divest the platform’s US operations — this time until Dec. 16 — staving off a nationwide shutdown of the app.】

item.title: 育空计划 3 月底前再出售 2 亿加元债务
item.description: 加拿大育空地区继上周首次发行债券后，计划在 2026 年 3 月 31 日前再出售 2 亿加元（1.46 亿美元）债券。【原文：The Canadian territory of Yukon is planning to sell another C$200 million ($146 million) in bonds before March 31, 2026, following its inaugural issuance last week.】

item.title: 报道称莫斯科发现前万事达高管与间谍有联系
item.description: 根据一家媒体机构的联合调查，前 Wirecard AG 高管 Jan Marsalek 目前住在莫斯科，似乎与俄罗斯情报部门有合作关系。【原文：Former Wirecard AG executive Jan Marsalek is living in Moscow and seems to be working with Russian intelligence services, according to a joint investigation by a consortium of media organizations.】

item.title: 新堡垒能源公司因波多黎各液化天然气交易重启而获得支持
item.description: 波多黎各总督周二证实，亿万富翁韦斯-爱登斯（Wes Edens）的新堡垒能源公司（New Fortress Energy Inc.【原文：Billionaire Wes Edens’ New Fortress Energy Inc. has finalized a seven-year deal worth $4 billion to supply liquefied natural gas to Puerto Rico, the governor confirmed on Tuesday, giving the financially-strained company a shot in the arm.】

item.title: 关税冲击就业市场，加拿大央行将降息：决策指南
item.description: 在越来越多的证据表明美国关税正在损害经济和劳动力市场的情况下，加拿大央行很可能在周三恢复降息。【原文：The Bank of Canada is likely to resume cutting interest rates on Wednesday amid mounting evidence US tariffs are damaging the economy and labor market.】

item.title: 弗里兰将离开卡尼内阁，担任乌克兰特别职务
item.description: 克里斯蒂娅-弗里兰（Chrystia Freeland）将离开内阁的运输和国内贸易部长职位，成为加拿大新任乌克兰重建特别代表。【原文：Chrystia Freeland is leaving her cabinet post as transport and internal trade minister to become Canada’s new special representative for the reconstruction of Ukraine.】

item.title: Citadel Securities 的鲁布纳认为股市在短暂震荡后将反弹
item.description: Citadel 证券公司的斯科特-鲁布纳（Scott Rubner）认为，美股在创下新纪录的反弹可能会在未来几周经历动荡，然后以繁荣的姿态结束今年。【原文：A rally that has taken US stocks to fresh records could experience turbulence in coming weeks before finishing the year with a flourish, according to Citadel Securities’ Scott Rubner.】

item.title: 当局在与俄罗斯黄金有关的调查中突袭瑞士交易商
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，瑞士当局上周四突袭了金属交易商 Open Mineral AG 的当地办事处，作为对其俄罗斯黄金交易可能违反制裁的调查的一部分。【原文：Swiss authorities raided the local office of metals trader Open Mineral AG last Thursday as part of an investigation into potential sanctions breaches relating to its trading in Russian gold, according to people familiar with the matter.】
